item.title: Making your blog FAIR
item.description: In August, Heidi Seibold wrote in her Newsletter about how she made it FAIR. This made me think about my own writing and how to secure the content even when/if I port by blog or change its structure. Here, I show how I use R, GitHub Actions and Zenodo API to create dois for all my posts.
